page.title: 13Clacton's New Environment
page.content:
More and more land in our area is being used for{housing for commuters.
Behind our house there used to be a big overgrown field which the people round my way called{THE JUNGLE}. One morning I woke up and heard a chugging. I ran into my brothers room but couldn't see anything. I ran downstairs and unlocked the backdoor. I looked through the fence which was made from metal wire and saw a JCB unloading bricks.
Over a period of about one and a half years they've built a new estate. They've put up a big fence which stops us playing football because the ball keeps going over and we can't get it back.
